title: Auto-mocking `Uni` does not work in continuous testing, failing tests that work in normal testing
body:
### Describe the bug

For normal testing (e.g. via surefire), [`MutiniyAnswer`](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/2.7.0.CR1/test-framework/junit5-mockito/src/main/java/io/quarkus/test/junit/mockito/internal/MutinyAnswer.java) is auto-registered via a custom [configuration](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/2.7.0.CR1/test-framework/junit5-mockito/src/main/java/org/mockito/configuration/MockitoConfiguration.java), so that you don't have to stub e.g. `ReactiveMailer.send(Mail)` on your own.

In continuous testing though, this configuration is not present/found so that a test that is running fine via surefire will fail with an NPE in continuous testing.

### Expected behavior

Same behavior as normal testing; auto-mocking takes place.

### Actual behavior

Auto-mocking `Uni` doesn't work in cont' testing, a NPE will pop up failing the test.

### How to Reproduce?

[q_ct-mutinyanswer.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/7918218/q_ct-mutinyanswer.zip)

1. `mvn clean verify` (all tests should pass)
2. `mvn clean quarkustest` (all tests should fail)

This reproducer contains three slightly different tests to show that this is a general problem also affecting `QuarkusTest`.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.6.3.Final, 2.7.0.CR1 and current 999-SNAPSHOT

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven 3.8.4

### Additional information

https://quarkusio.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/187038-dev/topic/mockito.2Einternal.2EMutinyAnswer

This is probably related to how `org.mockito.internal.configuration.ClassPathLoader` is loading such a custom config and to #7872.
